needle ● stitch marker abbreviations usa ​ chain chain double_crochet double_crochet ea each repeat s repetition s round s round s single_crochet single_crochet skip skip slip_stitch slip_stitch space space st s stitch es gauge 14 sts and 16 row in single_crochet = 4 ​ finished measurements 13 tall x 16 wide not including straps about the pattern this bright contemporary-but-classic market bag is great for trips to the farmers market the beach the library or for a sunny downtown stroll constructed with sturdy worsted-weight cotton it uses basic chains and double crochet stitches to form a simple square mesh pattern the solid single_crochet bottom creates a sturdy base and the straps can be altered to the crocheter s preferred length pattern written in 2017 by jenn fox for ​mushrump com​ this pattern may not be reproduced or copied without written permission of the author base using preferred color for the bottom of the bag chain 45 row 1 single_crochet into 2nd chain from hook single_crochet in all stitches across turn 44 st ​ row 2 chain 1 skip first st single_crochet in all sts across turn 44 st ​ row 3-13 repeat instructions from row 2 ​ do not turn after completing row 13 subsequent row will be worked in the round ​ round 14 single_crochet along the short edge of the bag bottom placing a total of 12 single_crochet sts single_crochet in ea st across ​ the long edge place 11 single_crochet sts along the next short edge single_crochet in ea st across the next long edge 111 sts rnds 15-18 working in a continuous spiral single_crochet in all sts around placing a st marker at the ​ beginning of ea round 111 sts mesh switch colors roughly halfway through the mesh section of the bag or wherever desired to ​ switch colors seamlessly wait until you have almost completed a mesh row but instead of slip stitching into the previous row s starting chain with your current yarn color pull a loop of the new color through the 3rd chain to form a slip_stitch continue with pattern as written tie ends of new and old yarn colors together round 19 chain 5 skip 2 sts double_crochet in next st *chain 2 skip 2 sts double_crochet in next st* until last 2 sts chain 2 slip_stitch into ​ 3rd chain of starting chain from previous round 37 reps of chain mesh rnds 20-32 chain 5 skip 2 sts double_crochet in next st *chain 2 skip 2 sts double_crochet in next st* around chain 2 slip_stitch into 3rd ​ chain of previous round top edge and handles round 33 chain 1 place 2 single_crochet into chain space *skip next st make 2 single_crochet into chain space* around slip_stitch into first single_crochet ​ from previous
